head.title: Ant Scott - FutartisticHub
head.description: Ant Scott, the inventor of Glitch Art
head.keywords: art, technology, future, artists, photographers, painters, developers, art-lovers, future-lovers, technology-lovers

body.title: Ant Scott
body.subtitle: Ant Scott coined the term Glitch Art in 2001, and is recognized as the inventor of the Glitch Esthetic.
